category.fun.description: Fun commands to help you enjoy.
category.developers.description: Commands that can only be used by developers.
category.moderators.description: Moderating and administrating the guild in all possible angles.

category.utility.description: Utilising the bot for your needs.
exp.levelup: :up: **|** **Congratulations %s ! You just leveled up to lvl %s**
command.cooldown: **%s Please wait for %s second(s) until you are allowed to use this command!**

command.ping.edit:
Pong!
Time taken: `%s` ms
Websocket: `%s` ms
command.ping.description: Checks how good the connection is.
command.prefix.changed: **Your prefix has been successfully changed to `%s` !**
command.prefix.current: **The prefix for this guild is currently `%s`**
command.prefix.description: Allows you to change or view your current prefix for this guild.
command.8ball.choices: No, not in a million years
command.8ball.embed.title: Response to %s's question
command.8ball.description: Ask a question and unfold the possibilites.
command.exp.embed.title: Your EXP Information
command.exp.embed.description: Here I will tell you everything about your exp.
command.exp.description: Check your exp status like a gangstar...
command.help.search.notexist: **%s Command does not exist. Please try again.**
command.info.bot.embed.title: Information about Ascetic Bot
command.info.bot.embed.description: Hello! Here below are some things that you might get to know about me!
command.info.description: Tells you information about me or this guild!
command.ban.reason.full:
__**%s has been banned for the reason:**__
%s
command.ban.description: Bans someone from the server (comes with a reason too).
command.kick.reason.full:
__**%s has been kicked for the reason:**__
%s
command.kick.description: Kicks someone from the user (with a reason).
command.prune.notprovided: You must provide a number of messages to delete!
command.prune.description: Deletes messages from a channel. (Maximum is 100)
command.language.current: **The language for this server is currently set to `%s`**
command.language.changed: **The language for this server has been successfully set to `%s` !**
command.language.description: Sets the language of the bot.
command.talkshort.talks: That won't be enough. Tell me more about it!
Thats sounds interesting. It was nice talking to you {mention}
command.talkshort.description: Fun way of talking to me.
command.restart.description: Restarts the bot or a shard.
command.test.description: For developers to test some features...
